email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. Following our recent discussion, I am pleased to present you with a freight offer for the shipment of 12,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles.

Vessel: PACIFIC TRADER
Incoterms: CFR
Freight Rate: USD 85/MT
Laycan: 20-25 October 2023
Vessel Details: DWT 65,000, LOA 220m
Demurrage Rate: USD 10,000 per day, pro rata

Please let me know your thoughts at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. USD 85/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 80/MT? Additionally, could you confirm the vessel's loading speed and any potential delays?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your prompt response. I can offer a revised rate of USD 82/MT, considering our long-standing relationship. The vessel's loading speed is 5,000 MT per day, and there are no anticipated delays at this time.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 82/MT is acceptable. However, we would like to extend the laycan to 22-27 October to accommodate some scheduling adjustments on our end. Could you confirm if this is feasible?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Extending the laycan to 22-27 October is feasible. I will adjust the schedule accordingly. Please confirm your acceptance of the revised terms, and I will send over the recap.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

We accept the revised terms. Please proceed with the recap.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Recap: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. Please find the recap below:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Shanghai
Discharge Port: Los Angeles
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: PACIFIC TRADER
Freight Rate: USD 82/MT
Laycan: 22-27 October 2023
Demurrage Rate: USD 10,000 per day, pro rata

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers
